reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As visitors from Oz we had expected spartan accommodation in an English country B&B, but we found a WOW room, so comfortable, spacious and quiet, good breakfasts, and great company in Caroline and Keith - our hosts, who made us very welcome. We really enjoyed our stay, and would unhesitatingly recommend it, specially for couples. Caroline's recommended nearby restaurants were very good.
reviews.title: Top country B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lime trees farm is a great b&b went there with husband to visit classic car show nearby, very relaxed very comfortable huge beds and great breakfast , being an animal lover the dogs and cats were a joy to see but they were not around all the time , will definitley stay there again,nearest resturant was about a 5/10 min drive but was worth while ,we went to the pub with the thia resturant which was very nice food.
reviews.title: Tranquil with lovely BIG bed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went to Oxford town during the day for shopping and attractions ~ use the park and ride it works out much cheeper the parking is sparce and expensive, take a trip punting down the river .
reviews.title: Good Value, Nice rooms but a bit chilly

reviews.text: We stayed at this Bed and Breakfast for two nights in November. The room was very nicely appointed with tea making equipment and toiletries. The B&B is an old farmhouse with stables. Our room was in the roof, large with a large bathroom, however it was very cold when we arrived at 4.30pm and we had to ask the owner to put the heating on, even though she know we were arriving. We had to get into bed to keep warm as the heating was not adequate for the large room, and needed to be kept on for longer. The second day we had to ask for the heating to be put on again when we came back at 4pm. The breakfast was very good, freshly cooked with good quality ingredients.
reviews.title: Lovely Bed & Breakfast near Oxford
